name: THE WORLD WENT ON
description:
THE WORLD WENT ON is a short story, about a mother fox and her cub, that leave the comfort of their den in search of food in an abandoned world.

-CONTROLS-

Keyboard and mouse

WASD-  to move

E - to start the game

Mouse -to move the camera

Left Shift -to sprint

Controller(ps4 tested only)

Left Stick -  to move

Square - to start the game

Right Stick- to move the camera

R1- to re-centre camera

Circle- to sprint
